front.title: Extension to IODEF-Document Class for Phishing Reports

abstract.t: Phishing, a broadly-launched social engineering attack in which an electronic identity is misrepresented in an attempt to trick individuals into revealing credentials, is expanding on the Internet. Corporations, Service Providers, consumer agencies, and financial institutions have started to collect and correlate phishing attack information to better plan out mitigation activities and to assist in prosecution. Early on it became obvious that a common format for the data reported or exchanged between this parties was necessary.
